business.headline: Elon Musk says balancing DOGE and CEO roles is tough as Tesla shares slideElon Musk has been actively involved in Tesla, SpaceX, X (formerly Twitter), and xAI, along with his inclination to working with the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE).

You may get a tax notice very soonThe tax authorities use a risk management strategy (RMS) to flag high-risk non-filers, said the department.  This system looks at high-value transactions (property purchases, large bank deposits, etc.), income from salary, rent, mutual funds, and shares, etc.
